alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 2:46PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CAMERON...SOUTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON DAVIS AND SOUTHEASTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES THROUGH 330 PM CST... At 246 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carlyss, or near Sulphur, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Lake, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Hayes, Hackberry, Thornwell, Hacketts Corner, Heberts Marina, Sweet Lake, Holmwood, Carlyss, and Bell City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; West Cameron
